name: andrew-profile
description: 1. Clone the repository: `git clone <repository_url>` or Download as a zip file 2. Unzip if downloaded as a zip file 3. Go to the directory where it was downloaded in terminal. `cd andrew-profile` 4. Go to the `_site` directory. `cd _site`. 5. In terminal install web server. `yarn global add httpserver` or `npm install -g httpserver` 6. Run the server. `httpserver -p 8888` 7. Go to the browser and open: `localhost:8888/index.html`
